name: Lonely Cube (Blind Mystics)
description:
Lonely Cube

Slide, teleport and roll your way through easy to learn, hard to master puzzles in Lonely Cube!

With more than 100 levels, you will learn as you play puzzles with increasing difficulty - collect all the tiles to win!

The game features a toggle-able high-detail and low-detail mode to run smoothly on any device.

Finished the game? Tweet us a screenshot of how you did @BlindMystics

Visit us at our website!
